name: Tower (SoupAcademy)
description:
Find the temple, find your freedom

Trapped inside the bodies of a horse and bird, you must find your way off the top of the tower by setting your spirit free. 

Tower is a short surrealistic adventure game where you can explore and complete levels both as a horse and  bird.  Take your time to look around the landscape and  through snippets of text and relics, piece together your story and find your way to freedom.

Tower is set to original music by Soup Academy and more music can be found here: https://soupacademy.bandcamp.com/releases

Other video projects by Soup Academy can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuPLhK41Vnj2YsQJBPfZXAQ?view_as=subscriber

Instagram @soupacademy

CONTROLS

Keyboard/Mouse controls for horse

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to control camera
  • Space to pause
  • Esc to exit

Keyboard/Mouse controls for bird

  • W and S for pitch
  • A and D for yaw
  • < and> for roll
  • Shift and Mouse to control camera
  • Space to pause 
  • Esc to exit
